sqlMap.statement: SELECT JOBNAME AS "JOBNAME" , CRONEXP AS "CRONEXP" , JOBCLASSNAME AS "JOBCLASSNAME" , USEYN AS "USEYN" , INSTANCENAME AS "INSTANCENAME" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAICM21 WHERE JOBNAME = #jobName#
INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAICM21( JOBNAME, CRONEXP, JOBCLASSNAME, USEYN, INSTANCENAME) VALUES( #jobName#, #cronExp#, #jobClassName#, #useYn#, #instanceName#)
UPDATE $schemaId$.TSEAICM21 SET CRONEXP = #cronExp# , JOBCLASSNAME = #jobClassName# , USEYN = #useYn# , INSTANCENAME = #instanceName# WHERE JOBNAME = #jobName#
SELECT JOBNAME AS "JOBNAME" , DATAKEY AS "DATAKEY" , DATAVALUE AS "DATAVALUE" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAICM22 WHERE JOBNAME = #jobName#
INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAICM22 ( JOBNAME, DATAKEY, DATAVALUE ) VALUES ( #jobName#, #dataKey#, #dataValue#)
SELECT JOBNAME AS "JOBNAME" , DATAKEY AS "DATAKEY" , DATAVALUE AS "DATAVALUE" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAICM22 ORDER BY JOBNAME, ADPTRIODSTCD, ADPTRPRPTYNAME
SELECT DATAKEY AS "DATAKEY", DATAVALUE AS "DATAVALUE" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAICM22 WHERE JOBNAME = #jobName#
SELECT JOBNAME AS "JOBNAME", CRONEXP AS "CRONEXP", JOBCLASSNAME AS "JOBCLASSNAME", USEYN AS "USEYN", INSTANCENAME AS "INSTANCENAME" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAICM21
SELECT JOBNAME AS "JOBNAME", CRONEXP AS "CRONEXP", JOBCLASSNAME AS "JOBCLASSNAME", USEYN AS "USEYN", INSTANCENAME AS "INSTANCENAME" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAICM21

SELECT M.JOBNAME AS "JOBNAME", M.CRONEXP AS "CRONEXP", M.JOBCLASSNAME AS "JOBCLASSNAME", M.USEYN AS "USEYN", M.INSTANCENAME AS "INSTANCENAME", D.DATAKEY AS "DATAKEY", D.DATAVALUE AS "DATAVALUE" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAICM21 M , $schemaId$.TSEAICM22 D WHERE M.JOBNAME = D.JOBNAME
